data.title: Ensure that the 'Sign In' button is easy to see on every page of the website.
data.observation: The 'Sign In' button is located at the top right corner of the website on almost all the pages.
data.suggestions: No action needed. The 'Sign In' button is in a noticeable spot on every page.

data.title: Ensure that the 'Sign In' button is easy to see on every page of the website. Additionally, users should be able to sign in using a combination of their username or email and password.
data.observation: The 'Sign In' button is visible on every page and clicking it opens a modal where users can enter their username or email and password to sign in.
data.suggestions: No additional changes needed. The current setup allows users to sign in using either username or email.

data.title: Ensure there is an accessible and straightforward process for users to recover forgotten passwords.
data.observation: There is a 'Forgot your login details?' link present in the 'Sign In' modal which redirects users to recover their password.
data.suggestions: Consider making the 'Forgot your login details?' link more prominent for better visibility.

data.title: Ensure there is an accessible and straightforward process for users who have forgotten their email addresses.
data.observation: The 'Forgot your login details?' link is available, but it is not explicitly clear if it helps in recovering email addresses as well.
data.suggestions: Clarify the process for recovering forgotten email addresses within the 'Forgot your login details?' section.

data.title: Ensure there is an option for users to 'Remember My Details'.
data.observation: The 'Remember my details' option is available in the 'Sign In' modal.
data.suggestions: No action needed. The 'Remember my details' option is prominently available.

data.title: Ensure the site features helpful error messaging that triggers only when fields are incorrectly input, ensuring users receive clear guidance to correct mistakes effectively.
data.observation: An error message appears when incorrect login details are entered, explaining that the username and/or password is incorrect.
data.suggestions: Ensure error messages are specific and provide guidance on how to rectify the issue. Current messages meet the criteria.

data.title: Ensure CAPTCHA or other anti-bot measures are implemented during sign-in to enhance security and prevent automated attacks, thereby safeguarding user accounts and maintaining the integrity of the login process.
data.observation: No CAPTCHA or anti-bot measure is observed in the sign-in process through the screenshots.
data.suggestions: Implement CAPTCHA or similar anti-bot measures during the sign-in process to enhance security.

data.title: Ensure that error messaging is clear and concise, providing users with specific reasons for the error encountered and clear instructions on the next steps to resolve the issue effectively.
data.observation: Error messages provide clear information about incorrect username or password.
data.suggestions: Ensure all error messages maintain clarity and provide specific guidance. Current implementation is effective.
